title: Putumayo presents: Cape Verde (1999)
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“Cape VerdeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (1999) presents the music of the islands just 300 miles off West Africa's Senegalese coast. Drawing from Portuguese and African influences, the music of Cape Verde is most often rooted in a sensually languid and rhythmically complex cousin of the blues called morna. 

This collection cleverly balances the alluring minor key of morna with the lesser-known merry festivity of coladeira, the Cape's party music, and a jazz-tinged dance music called funana. 

Mysteriously bewitching, "Cape Verde" is a gorgeous melange of elegant piano, acoustic strings, rousing horn sections, propulsive drumming, flamboyant keyboards, and superb vocalists.


Various Artists

Putumayo presents: Cape Verde

1999


  CD / 1999 / 320Kbps
